addTagToContact.description: Assign a tag to an existing contact - select an existing tag or create a new one

props.name: tagSource
props.description: Choose whether to use an existing tag or create a new one

props.name: newTagName
props.description: Enter the name for the new tag (only used when "Create New Tag" is selected)

createContact.description: Create a new contact with email and contact fields from your Systeme.io account, with optional tags

props.name: dynamicContactFields
props.description: Set contact fields from your Systeme.io account

props.name: tagSource
props.description: Choose how to handle tags for this contact

props.name: newTagNames
props.description: Enter names for new tags to create and assign (only used when "Create New Tags" is selected)

findContactByEmail.description: Locate an existing contact by email address

props.description: The email address to search for

removeTagFromContact.description: Remove a tag that is currently assigned to an existing contact

props.name: tagId
props.description: Select a tag currently assigned to this contact

updateContact.description: Update fields (name, phone, custom fields) of an existing contact using fields from your Systeme.io account

props.name: dynamicContactFields

props.name: customFields
props.description: Add or update custom fields with manual slug entry (use empty value to clear field)

props.description: The unique identifier for this field (e.g., custom_field_1, my_field)

props.description: The value for this field (leave empty to clear the field)
